page.title: 10SHIPDHAM SCHOOL CLUBS
page.content: {MUSIC CLUBS;}recorder, guitar, brass band, clarinet, orchestra.{SPORT;} badminton, 5 a-side, football, netball hockey, athletics.{OTHERS} computer,gardening,drama, library, stamps. The smaller numbers of children in clubs compared to class sizes (average 32) enables difficult instruments to be taught. Teachers run the clubs voluntarily at lunchtime or after school. The football pitch can be floodlit. The computer club was started this year. Many village clubs use the school hall e.g.Karate, Youth Club, Guides and Brownies. Many of the skills learned in the music/drama clubs are utilised in school plays, performances and assemblies. It has become a tradition to have a school production once a year which involves many of the chidren in drama,music and backstage work. All the staff help.
